name: Tankette (PunGo)
description:
Tankette is an unfolding arcade game for playdate console where you are a tiny tank trying to shoot bugs that come at you. Whether you are looking for a small challenge or a leisurely ride, tankette is the adventure for you.

The game can be played with or without the crank. The tank moves by the left-right arrow key, and the gun is targeted using the crank or up-down arrow. A is fire, B is engine boost. And the rest is for you to discover on your own.

The art is hand-drawn, and the sound assets are taken from pixabay.com.

Here is a link to our patreon page where you can download the game and engage with the community.

Tankette | PunGo on Patreon

Happy tanking, everyone, and have a blast!
